title: Swap static app logo asset to new uploaded image

requirements.summary: Replace the existing static logo file so all current /assets/logo-job.jpg usages render the new uploaded logo without changing any src paths.
acceptanceCriteria: A logo image file exists at frontend/public/assets/logo-job.jpg and is included in the production build.
Landing page hero logo displays the new logo (no broken image).
Landing page footer logo displays the new logo (no broken image).
Dashboard header and footer logos display the new logo (no broken image).
Admin header logo displays the new logo (no broken image).
No code changes are required to existing image src paths (they remain /assets/logo-job.jpg).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing logo asset with the uploaded image (use uploaded "logo job-2.jpg" as the source), keeping the exact filename and location so all existing references continue to work without code changes.
